subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A night after they snapped a six-game losing skid, the Mets fell to the Diamondbacks and dropped to 5-16 in July. Jon Niese gave up a career high eight runs.
snippet: A night after they snapped a six-game losing skid, the Mets fell to the Diamondbacks and dropped to 5-16 in July. Jon Niese gave up a career high eight runs.
